entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 26.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 26. Wind chill minus 28 this evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 29 January 2023
